nodes.text: Meriones was a Human male lieutenant who served in the Republic Navy as an aide to Captain Gilad Pellaeon of Leveler during the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, he was stationed aboard Leveler when he reported to the Captain that he received a coded message from Hallena Devis. After giving the captain the news about the Separatist army increasing on JanFathal, he disliked Gilad's belief that Meriones had only gotten his position due to family connections in the fleet.
